"A.D.2028/4/25/13:30": "Ahaha... We're so popular!"
"Kohri, don't even start. But, these numbers are a little one sided. <%me>, big bro, what should we do?"
"The ones behind us will catch up if we keep dealing with the ones in front of us."
"The best course of action would be for me to stay behind. But, then I'd be leaving it up to you guys to stop Ardem..."
"What are you hesitating for, 30% sexy guy?!"
"How kind of you to 10% admit that you're in a bad place. I find these kind of people desire that situation in the first place."
"Maxwell! Laplace!"
"Come, Grimoire Marchen."
"You guys!"
"Hey, you yandere! Behind you, don't let your guard down!"
"Wha... whawhawhawha?!"
"Hoho, I made it just in time."
"Mr. Aratron!"
"You guys survived?"
"Of course we did! As if I'd let me and Phul die in such a pitiful way!"
"We would have died for sure if Phaleg didn't help us."
"It seems we're all working towards the same goal. We'll offer our aid in the name of justice."
"It's not like I came here to help you! I'm here to avenge Mother!"
"We haven't fulled healed our injuries though. To put it like Och would, we're 50% okay?"
"Psh, the condition of my body doesn't matter. Laplace and Maxwell do the fighting anyway!"
"There's no need for the tough act, Och. Regardless of who does it, the result will be the same. Value the results, not the process."
"Grr... I know that!"
"So that's how it is, 10% sexy guy! All of you hurry up and go!"
"Everything is about using the right people at the right time. <%me>, you understand, right? My ability is perfect for stalling time."
"While you were able to break it, it's an ability that no one can surpass but you, <%me>!"
"I'm a bit irritated I won't be able to see you avenge Mother, but I'm okay with being a thorn in their side by being here."
"...Don't die."
"Hmph! The same to you, don't die! 10% sexy guy!"
"Awww... Och, you just triggered a death flag."
"A death what? What do you mean?"
"Hoho. It doesn't matter, does it? Our goal is to hold back these monsters, and that's it."
"To not let justice be done... would be a disgrace to humanity. That'd make Mother sad too."
"Ah, it seems they can't wait any longer."
"Jeez, such impatient beings. Even if you don't rush us, we'll still be here. Phul! Are you ready?"
"Of course, Och."
"Mother Cluster, Apostle of Moon. Phul Janice Lasswitz."
"Mother Cluster, Apostle of Sun! Och Miller!"
"Mother Cluster, Apostle of Earth! Aratron Tolstoy!"
"To ensure Mother's feelings aren't abandoned!"
"To connect with Mother's feelings!"
"We, Mother Cluster, will now show you our strength!"
